title: On the Road with Austin & Santino
overview: Project Runway breakout stars Austin Scarlett and Santino Rice have made names for themselves on and off the catwalk with their unique styles and eyes for fashion, working with some of the biggest stars in the business. In On the Road with Austin & Santino, the talented designers team up for the first time ever to travel to, and immerse themselves in the culture of, small towns across America.
